briefTitle: Radiation Therapy Followed by Surgery in Treating Patients With Early-Stage Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Image Guided Preoperative Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation (PAPBI): Defining Radiotherapy Sensitivity
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of unifocal cT1-2 (1-3 cm) pN0 M0 breast cancer
* Must have undergone a sentinel node procedure prior to irradiation

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* See Disease Characteristics
